articles.title: Macron doesn't rule out sending Western troops to Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: European leaders agreed to boost ammunition purchases from third-country suppliers.
articles.content: "It is a recognition of the challenge Ukraine faces, and that there is a bit more give, it's a credit to the French. They've had a longstanding concern [about purchases from non-EU countries], and it… [+1341 chars]

articles.title: Houthis Hit Underwater Communications Cables - SubTel Forum
articles.description: Houthi rebels have damaged four major submarine communication cables in the Red Sea, causing significant disruptions between Europe and Asia
articles.content:
By Assaf Gilead, GlobesFebruary 26, 2024
